koohiiStory1: Note: this kanji refers to event or case. Current Affair headline: Mr. T has affair with cow. "It´s only animal ´man´ enough for me".
koohiiStory2: I´m having a hard time keep straight just which animal Mr. T is having an affair with. chamcham´s story made me realize that Mr. T is not having an "affair", he´s having an "heifair." Get it?
myStory: chữ kiện. vụ việc, món đồ. nhân + ngưu. người và bò là sự kiện
words: example, precedent, the usual, the said, the above-mentioned, (man) in question
event, affair, incident, case, plot, trouble, scandal
